metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4914 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in PrintPreview in Google Chrome prior to104.0.5112.79 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially exploit heap corruption via a craftedHTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
